DisplayProperties.description: Properties related to how the entity is displayed in the Datahub UI

colorHex.description: The color associated with the entity in Hex. For example #FFFFFF.

icon.description: The icon associated with the entity

IconProperties.description: Properties describing an icon associated with an entity

iconLibrary.description: The source of the icon: e.g. Antd, Material, etc

style.description: Any modifier for the icon, this will be library-specific, e.g. filled/outlined, etc
